name: lsass.exe_incorrect_path
pattern: {"query": "SELECT * FROM processes WHERE LOWER(name)='lsass.exe' AND LOWER(path)!='c:\\windows\\system32\\lsass.exe' AND path!='';", "interval": 3600, "description": "Detect processes masquerading as legitimate Windows processes - ATT&CK T1034", "removed": false}
